questions.quote: I can't believe you're really going out with a woman named Lois.
We'll start out with one, and they when it catches on, we're gonna have a whole fleet!
Well, why would the guy make up something like that? Of all the names he could pick, why settle on Jon Voight?
Oh, it's a lovely song.  "How do you solve a problem like Maria?..."
What's even more amazing is his formal training is in pediatrics.
Nevermind. Disgraceful. Leaves you sitting there on the kitchen floor like some kind of roach trap. Wham, bam, thank you ma'am. Sir, whatever. She's not going to get away with this.
What's he doing? Is he out of his mind? Do you see him? I don't even think I see him anymore. Where is he?
Listen, you idiot! Just calm down! I know Jerry, he's not a nazi.
Do you wanna talk about hotels, or do you wanna win some ball games?
Hoh, that Milos.  Well uh, what shall we do, uhm, care for a cup of coffee?
